articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of Korean Women's Union in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of Korean Women's Union in Japan
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday had a talk with a delegation for marking the 70th anniversary of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan led by Kim Il Sun, adviser of its Central Standing Committee, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.

articles.title: Zambian Figure Supports Struggle of WPK
articles.content:
Zambian Figure Supports Struggle of WPK
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The DPRK ambassador to Zambia met the general secretary of the Patriotic Front of Zambia on August 31.
					 The general secretary said:
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government gave positive supports to the Zambian people's struggle for independence and their state building in the past.
					
					 We thank the WPK for supporting our Party's activities.
					
					 Sanctions and pressure can never be a solution to the issue.
					
					 We extend solidarity to the struggle of the WPK.

articles.title: Kanji Inoki Arrives Here
articles.content:
Kanji Inoki Arrives Here
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Kanji Inoki, member of the House of Councillors of Japan, and his party arrived here on Thursday.

articles.title: KAPPC Clarifies Stand on Hostile Forces' Moves for Another Sanctions on DPRK
articles.content:
KAPPC Clarifies Stand on Hostile Forces' Moves for Another Sanctions on DPRK
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee (KAPPC) issued a statement Thursday to denounce the hostile forces' fresh moves for putting sanctions and pressure on the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The DPRK's successful test of H-bomb helped greatly deter the danger of a nuclear war by the U.S. in Far East and Asia-Pacific including the Korean peninsula and provided a reliable guarantee for ensuring world peace and security. This feat deserves admiration by humankind.
					
					 However, the hostile forces including the U.S. are going desperate to apply fresh sanctions and pressure on the DPRK while branding its successful H-bomb test as "threat" to peace and security and "challenge" to UN "resolutions".
					
					 Utterly disgusting is the despicable behavior of the Japanese reactionaries and the south Korean puppet forces taking the lead here.
					
					 The Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee clarifies the following principled stand under the prevailing situation:
					
					 1. The U.S. should stop rash act and not run wild, with deep consideration of the position and weight of its rival Juche Korea that have undergone change after its access to H-bomb.
					
					 If the U.S. adheres to sanctions and pressure, not properly judging the great significance and the stern warning given by the success in the H-bomb test of Juche Korea, it will face unprecedentedly resolute counteraction it can not hold control of.
					
					 2. Japan should clearly understand its position and stop indecent deed of acting as the U.S. cat's paw.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK with pent-up wrath against the Japanese reactionaries are waiting for a moment to settle accounts with the present Japanese authorities who have taken the lead in tightening sanctions against the DPRK pursuant to the U.S.
					
					 Japan should bear in mind that it is near the DPRK, world-level military power possessed of diversified A-bomb, H-bomb and rockets of deadly striking power and hit effect.
					
					 3. The south Korean authorities should not spout "strong military counteraction" for which they can not be responsible, a bluff unbecoming for their have-not position.
					
					 The stooges moving at the beck and call of others, being subject to sycophancy and submission should not go unreasonable as to call for slapping "painful sanctions" and "pressure", and should stop provoking laughter of people with their such clumsy counteraction as "joint strike" reminiscent of children's playing at soldiers. 
					
					 4. The world including the neighboring countries needs to have proper understanding of the nuclear issue of Korea.
					
					 The nuclear blackmail and threat the U.S. has posed to the DPRK so far have been a wrong option against the rival of wrong choice. 
					
					 The world will more keenly realize what a special event the DPRK's possession of H-bomb becomes in terminating the U.S. and other big powers' high-handed and arbitrary practices and establishing a fair international order.
					
					 Taking this opportunity, we appeal to the world conscience to turn out in the action to set right the biased international order ruled by the U.S. and the misguided trend in which injustice prevails over justice.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the UNDP, UNICEF, the United Nations Population Fund, the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO), the WFP and the WHO missions here visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Thursday on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 They laid floral baskets before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Poem-reciting Meeting of Trade Union Officials and Members
articles.content:
Poem-reciting Meeting of Trade Union Officials and Members
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- A poem-reciting meeting of officials and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea took place at the Central Hall of Workers Thursday to celebrate the 69th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Such poems were recited at the event as "My Motherland" and "Prosperous DPRK".
					
					 Listening to those poems, the participants keenly felt the revolutionary feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for founding and strengthening the DPRK as well as the preciousness of the motherland.
					
					 The poems well represented the revolutionary enthusiasm of the trade union members and other workers who have devoted their patriotic zeal and wisdom to the prosperity of the socialist country, in response to the call of the Party and the leader.
					
					 Among those present at the meeting were Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the GFTUK Central Committee.

articles.title: More Rallies Hail Successful H-bomb Test
articles.content:
More Rallies Hail Successful H-bomb Test
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Army-people rallies took place in South Phyongan Province, North Phyongan Province, South Hwanghae Province, Kangwon Province, North Hamgyong Province and South Hamgyong Province on Thursday to hail the DPRK's successful ICBM-ready H-bomb test conducted under the strategic plan of the Workers' Party of Korea for building a nuclear force.
					 Attending the rallies were officials of party and power organs, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, farms and universities and men and officers of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, working people and students.
					
					 Congratulatory speeches were made there.
					
					 Speakers said that the detonation of the super-powerful thermonuclear weapon ahead of the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK was a gift of loyalty to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and an auspicious great national event that instilled confidence and optimism into the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 They stressed that the above-said successful test meant the resolute and just measure for self-defence to cope with the anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPRK being pursued by the U.S. imperialists, sworn enemy of the Korean people.
					
					 They expressed their will to give priority to supplying everything necessary for the development of the defence industry by bringing about great innovations in all fields and units, true to the Party's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts, and thus mercilessly smash the aggressive war moves of the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces.
					
					 If the enemy forces move to ignite a war at last, faulting the DPRK's entirely just self-defensive measures for bolstering the nuclear force, the invincible revolutionary Paektusan army will put a definite end to the destiny of the U.S. imperialists through the most merciless preemptive strikes.
					
					 Speakers at the rallies called for staging a dynamic struggle to build a socialist power of Juche, a fairyland for people, on this land at an early date, closely united around respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: There Is No Place for Enemy to Survive on Earth: DPRK Citizens
articles.content:
There Is No Place for Enemy to Survive on Earth: DPRK Citizens
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Through the successful H-bomb test for ICBM, we clearly showed the tremendous nuclear might of the DPRK to the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces, said Han Pok Nam, head of a department of Kim Chaek University of Technology, when interviewed by KCNA.
					 Our nuclear scientists dealt a heavy blow once again at the U.S. imperialists running amuck to cut off the lifeline of the DPRK with powerful H-bomb test, he said, adding:
					
					 We will make more sci-tech achievements for the country and the people like nuclear scientists.
					
					 O Pong Man, a workshop head of the East Pyongyang Thermal Power Plant, said:
					
					 I feel like seeing the wretched sight of the U.S. imperialists and other hostile forces stupefied with the news of the successful H-bomb test for ICMB conducted by nuclear scientists faithful to the Workers' Party of Korea's line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force. Our workers will increase electric-power production in the spirit of self-reliance so as to frustrate the enemies' sanctions and war moves.
					
					 Ri Il Hyok, a student of Pyongyang University of Architecture, said:
					
					 It is a stern warning of Songun (military-first) Korea that those who provoke us will find no place to survive on the earth.
					
					 We will display our might as the advancing group and a wing of the Workers' Party of Korea in the efforts to bring earlier the final victory in the building of a socialist power.

articles.title: Poster for 20th World Taekwon-Do Championships Produced
articles.content:
Poster for 20th World Taekwon-Do Championships Produced
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- A poster for the 20th World Taekwon-Do Championships was produced in the DPRK.
					 Depicted in its center against a world map is the logo of the championships. And on its upper part are the name of the championships and letters reading "Pyongyang 2017".
					
					 On its lower part there are remodeled Taekwon-Do Hall and the venue and period of the championships.

articles.title: DPRK's Flag
articles.content:
DPRK's Flag
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- With the approach of the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK (September 9), the Korean people are looking back upon the days when the national flag was produced under the meticulous guidance of President Kim Il Sung, the founder of socialist Korea.
					 In the days of the nation building, the President instructed in detail the ideological contents to be reflected in the flag, and the ways of doing so.
					
					 Red color of the flag symbolizes blood shed by the anti-Japanese forerunners and other Korean patriots and invincible might of the people firmly united around the Republic.
					
					 White color shows that the Korean people are a homogeneous nation that has lived with the same lineage, language and culture in one territory. And blue color represents lively figures of working people striving to build a new democratic society and the spirit of the Korean people struggling for the peace and progress of the world.
					
					 A decision on the enforcement of the DPRK constitution was adopted by consensus at the Fifth Session of the People's Assembly of North Korea held on July 10, Juche 37 (1948) in the presence of the President.
					
					 That day the DPRK's flag was hoisted amid the solemn playing of the national anthem.
					
					 The flag of the DPRK will fly high in the sky forever thanks to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Severe Judgment on Park Geun Hye and Her Coteries
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Severe Judgment on Park Geun Hye and Her Coteries
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group is paying a high price for the crimes it had committed after wresting power in south Korea at the prodding of foreign forces.
					 Those criminals, who were engaged in fascist rule and irregularities by abusing "state power" in conspiracy with traitor Park, face punishments at court one after another. A severe judgment will be made on Park, too, before long.
					
					 In this regard, Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in an article:
					
					 The miserable end of Park is a deserved punishment on the heinous sycophantic traitor who sold off the dignity and interests of the nation to the foreign forces in a bid to prolong her dirty remaining days.
					
					 This is the fate and stern judgment by the public on the crazy witch and dictator who had gone frantic with the confrontation with the fellow countrymen, blocking the national unity and reunification and destroying the north-south relations and had engaged herself in the fascist suppression and anti-social rule.
					
					 The present miserable plight of Park and her coteries clearly show the lesson of history that anyone keen on sycophancy, confrontation with the fellow countrymen and fascist dictatorship will never escape from the stern judgment by history and the public but face the most miserable end.

articles.title: U.S. Ambition for Dominating World Is Anachronistic: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Ambition for Dominating World Is Anachronistic: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Recently, the U.S. announced its plan to deploy a new radar system in Belau. It claims it will increase the capacity of Belau's maritime law enforcement and offer the U.S. bigger air monitoring capacity.
					 The radar's range can cover a vast area including Spratly Islands.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun in a commentary Thursday terms this a revelation of the U.S. invariable wild ambition to dominate the world by securing unchallenged military supremacy over its potential rivals.
					
					 It says:
					
					 The U.S. calculates that it can easily bring the potential rivals under its control and lord it over the world when it secures an absolute military edge.
					
					 The Asia-Pacific region has turned into the world's biggest hot spot, where a fierce big powers' playing of chicken is going on, due to the U.S. foolhardy arms buildup to get an absolute military edge.
					
					 To preserve peace and security in the Asia-Pacific region, notably on the Korean peninsula situated in Northeast Asia, has become a very important international matter.
					
					 The DPRK decided to have access to nuclear deterrent for self-defence and has bolstered it in every way to tackle the U.S. and its vassal forces' reckless nuclear threats. It was once again proved that this option was entirely right.
					
					 The U.S. wild ambition for dominating the world against the trend of the times is an anachronistic one.
					
					 The U.S. should keep in mind that military edge is not its monopoly, and drop the stupid try.

articles.title: Papers Dismiss S. Korean Forces' "Conception of Offensive Operation"
articles.content:
Papers Dismiss S. Korean Forces' "Conception of Offensive Operation"
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The chief executive of south Korea grumbled, recently when receiving an operation report of the puppet defense ministry, about the delay of establishment of "triad strike system" in the light of the DPRK's nuclear and missile capabilities increasing on a daily basis. He cried out for turning into the offensive operation and pushing ahead with the reform of military structure if someone's "provocation goes beyond the line".
					 Commenting on the fact, Rodong Sinmun Thursday says:
					
					 It is ridiculous for the south Korean puppet forces to spell bellicose remarks, still unaware of the strategic position of the DPRK and their poor condition being dependent on the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK regards such military moves as call for "conception of offensive operation" as a ridiculous wriggling of those taken aback by thunder.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should behave themselves, clearly understanding the DPRK's powerful military muscle and the trend of the times.
					
					 The traitors seeking to do harm to compatriots with guns given by the U.S. can not escape from a baptism of fire for justice. If they are carried away by ill-advised bravery without any capability, south Korea will face a miserable outcome.
					
					 They should not go reckless, mindful of this warning.
					
					 Minju Joson in a commentary says that the best way for the south Korean authorities is to hold their tongue and control themselves.

articles.title: Struggle against U.S., Japan and War Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle against U.S., Japan and War Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online paper Minjok Ilbo, the Seoul City Committee of the People's Democratic Party of south Korea issued a statement on September 4 reflecting its stand to vigorously struggle against the U.S., Japan and a war.
					 The statement accused the present "government" of following the outsiders while antagonizing the compatriots as the principal enemy.
					
					 It expressed the will to stand in the struggle against the U.S., Japan and war to remove the dark clouds of war from the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Protests Authorities Shunning Solution of Issue of Discharged
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Protests Authorities Shunning Solution of Issue of Discharged
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The Committee for Reinstatement of Victims of the Government Employees Union of south Korea held a rally outside the "National Assembly" (NA) building on September 4 to denounce the puppet authorities for shunning the issue of those dismissed, according to the south Korean newspaper Nodong and Segye.
					 Speakers at the rally charged that the promise, made by the present chief executive at the time when he was candidate for the "presidential" election, does not match the attitude of the present "government".
					
					 A resolution was read out there.
					
					 At the end of the rally the organization entered the building of the ruling party to convey a written stand clarifying the justice of the reinstatement of those dismissed.
					
					 Then it went into a sit-in strike around the NA.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Austria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Austria
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK posted on its internet homepage the full text of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" on August 26 to mark the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in their lifetime.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for resolutely defending and glorifying the idea and exploits of the great leaders.

articles.title: DPRK's Founding Anniversary Marked by DR Congo Organization
articles.content:
DPRK's Founding Anniversary Marked by DR Congo Organization
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo on August 29 released a special bulletin to mark the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The bulletin edited an article under the title "Benevolent father President Kim Il Sung, founder of the DPRK" illustrated with a portrait of the smiling President.
					
					 It said:
					
					 September 9 is the day marking the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung set forth the line for building a genuine people's power protecting the interests of the working masses and established a people's revolutionary government in the guerrilla base during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					 After the liberation of Korea, he pushed forward the work for building an independent and sovereign state representing the interests of all the Korean people and finally declared the foundation of the DPRK on September 9, 1948.
					
					 Under his wise leadership, the army and people of the DPRK defeated the U.S. imperialists boasting of being "the world's strongest" in the Fatherland Liberation War and honorably defended the country's sovereignty and dignity.
					
					 And they completed the post-war rehabilitation and construction and carried out the historic task of socialist industrialization in a short period and thus laid a solid foundation for the independent national economy that remains steady even in the world economic upheavals.
					
					 The DPRK turned into a socialist country independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence, admired by the world.
					
					 The President's feats for the founding of the DPRK and its development will go down in history with today's Korea advancing victoriously.

articles.title: U.S. Pressure upon DPRK Slammed Abroad
articles.content:
U.S. Pressure upon DPRK Slammed Abroad
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Political parties and bodies of Peru and India made public statements on Aug. 28 and 29 in denunciation of the U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK.
					 The People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru said:
					
					 We reject anti-DPRK "sanctions resolution" of the UNSC. The U.S. audaciously cooked up the "resolution" over the DPRK's ICBM test-launch.
					
					 We sharply denounce the U.S. vicious moves.
					
					 We also demand that the U.S. respect the DPRK's sovereignty.
					
					 Urging the U.S. to roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK which has lasted for more than 70 years and replace the Korean Armistice Agreement with a peace accord, the All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association said in its statement:
					
					 The U.S. should pay attention to the world voice demanding an end to the outsiders' interference in the settlement of the Korean peninsula issue.
					
					 We demand that the UN scrap the said "resolution" as it only spells the regional tension.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones de Presidente sirio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones de Presidente sirio
Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le remitiera el dia 5 Bashar al-Assad, Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria.
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					En ocasion del 69o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, le extiendo a Su Excelencia la mas sincera felicitacion en nombre del pueblo arabe de Siria y en el mio propio y formulo votos por la buena salud y la felicidad de Su Excelencia y el mayor progreso y prosperidad de vuestro pueblo amistoso.
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para afirmar que la Republica Arabe de Siria seguira intensificando las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con vuestro pais de acuerdo con los intereses comunes de los pueblos de nuestros dos paises amistosos.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de UMDC en Japon
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de UMDC en Japon
Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, departio el dia 7 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la delegacion de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas Coreanas en Japon, presidida por Kim Il Sun, asesora del Presidium del Comite Central, que visita la patria en ocasion del 70o aniversario de su fundacion.

articles.title: Secretario general de Frente Patriotico de Zambia se solidariza con lucha de PTC
articles.content:
Secretario general de Frente Patriotico de Zambia se solidariza con lucha de PTC
Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la RPDC se reunio el 31 de agosto con el secretario general del Frente Patriotico de Zambia.
					En la ocasion, el politico zambiano dijo como sigue:
					
					En el tiempo pasado, el Partido del Trabajo y el gobierno de Corea han brindado activa asistencia a la lucha del pueblo zambiano por la independencia y la construccion del Estado.
					
					Agradezco al PTC que apoya las actividades de nuestra agrupacion politica.
					
					La sancion y las presiones no pueden ser el remedio de la solucion del problema.
					
					Expresamos la solidaridad con la lucha del PTC.

articles.title: CCPAP declara posicion de principios frente a nuevas maniobras de sancion y presion anti-RPDC
articles.content:
CCPAP declara posicion de principios frente a nuevas maniobras de sancion y presion anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico (CCPAP) publico el dia 7 una declaracion denunciando las nuevas maniobras de sancion y presion de las fuerzas hostiles contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Gracias al exito en la prueba de la bomba H realizada por la RPDC se ha detenido mucho el peligro de guerra nuclear causado por EE.UU. en la region del Extremo Oriente incluyendo la Peninsula Coreana y la de Asia-Pacifico y preparado la garantia confiable para asegurar la paz y la seguridad del mundo.
					
					Esto deviene la proeza historica a ser elogiada por todo el mundo, senala la declaracion y prosigue:
					
					Pero, EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles hacen esfuerzos desesperados por dar la nueva sancion y presion a la RPDC volviendo a cuestionar el acontecimiento historico arriba mencionado como la "amenaza" a la paz y seguridad y el "desafio" a la supuesta "resolucion" de la ONU.
					
					En particular, llegan a la etapa intolerable las conductas bochornosas de los reaccionarios japoneses y los titeres surcoreanos que estan al frente de esas maniobras.
					
					En relacion con la situacion creada, el CCPAP aclaro la posicion de principios como sigue:
					
					1. EE.UU. debe tratar con seriedad la posicion y el peso de su rival, Corea del Juche, cambiados por su posesion de la bomba H y dejar de actuar imprudentemente.
					
					Si EE.UU., preso por su meditacion vieja, recurre a la sancion y presion sin juzgar bien el enorme sentido y la severa advertencia que contiene el exito de la Corea Juche en la prueba del arma termonuclear arriba referido, EE.UU. se enfrentara con la insuperable reaccion rotunda. 
					
					2. Japon debe dejar de actuar groseramente como sirviente fiel de EE.UU. entendiendo bien su situacion. 
					
					Nuestro ejercito y pueblo con arraigado rencor a los reaccionarios japoneses estan esperando el momento de saldar la cuenta estricta con los crimenes de las autoridades japonesas en actual mandato que obedeciendo a ciegas a EE.UU. vinieron sumandose al frente a la campana de sancion anti-RPDC.
					
					Japon debe estar muy consciente de que esta mas cerca de su pais la RPDC, potencia militar de talla mundial con bombas atomicas, bomba H y cohetes diversificados con gran poderio y efectividad.
					
					3. Las autoridades surcoreanas, que no tienen nada, deben dejar de actuar imprudentemente hablando de la "fuerte represalia militar", disparate irresponsable.
					
					Siendo lacayas acostumbradas al servilismo y subyugacion a grandes potencias, no deben soltar los disparates insolentes como "sancion dura" y "presion" sobre alguien ni causar la burla de la gente hablando de la supuesta reaccion miserable como "ataque conjunto" semejante a un juego militar de los ninos. 
					
					4. Los paises vecinos y los demas del mundo deben comprender correctamente el problema nuclear de Corea. 
					
					El chantaje y amenaza nucleares impuestos hasta la fecha por EE.UU. contra la RPDC devienen una opcion erronea contra el rival mal elegido.
					
					A medida que pasan los dias, el mundo experimentara mas claramente la significacion especial de la posesion de la bomba H por la RPDC que se mostrara en la lucha por acabar con el despotismo y las arbitrariedades de EE.UU. y otras potencias y establecer un imparcial orden internacional.
					
					Aprovechamos esta oportunidad para exhortar una vez mas a la conciencia del mundo que se levante en la lucha por corregir el desigual orden internacional dominado por EE.UU. y la corriente erronea en que la injusticia prevalece sobre la justicia.
